UPDATE ain_antecedenteinternos SET AIN_POS_IRREGULAR_MAX=CASE WHEN(ABS(AIN_POS_IRREGULAR_MAX ) > ABS(?)) THEN AIN_POS_IRREGULAR_MAX ELSE ? END, AIN_DIAS_MAX_IRREGULAR=CASE WHEN(AIN_DIAS_MAX_IRREGULAR > ?) THEN AIN_DIAS_MAX_IRREGULAR ELSE ?
